summary: Twelve jurors must decide the fate of a Chechen adolescent charged with murdering his stepfather.
cast: Sergey Makovetskiy|Nikita Mikhalkov|Sergey Garmash|Valentin Gaft|Aleksey Petrenko|Yuriy Stoyanov|Sergey Gazarov|Mikhail Efremov|Aleksey Gorbunov|Sergey Artsibashev|Viktor Verzhbitskiy|Roman Madyanov|Aleksandr Adabashyan|Apti Magamaev|Abdi Magamaev|Natalya Surkova|Konstantin Glushkov|Vladimir Nefyodov|Vyacheslav Gilinov|Lyubov Rudneva|Olga Khokhlova|Igor Vernik|Vladimir Komarov|Lasha Marykhuba|Ferit Myazitov|Abdulbasyr Gitinov|Mikael Bazorkin|Mesedo Salimova|Soslan Sanakoev|Alan Tsopanov|Gennadiy Ternovskiy|Andrey Sukharev|Sergey Kholmogorov
